::Skyburst::

"You guys stay for a little while and make sure everything is ok.
Especialy watch that other dragon, Luzbel. I dont believe that one is
with our new friends here. I'll take Pegatron back home."
Skyburst picks up Pegatron, and transformes to helicoptor mode.


OOC: I want to get permission to move Pegatron before continueing.
